postfinancecheckout-settings.messageNotBlank: This value should not be blank.

button.description: Click this button to set PostFinanceCheckout as default payment handler in the selected SalesChannel
button.label: Set PostFinanceCheckout as default payment handler

applicationKey.label: Application Key
applicationKey.tooltipText: The Application Key is used to authenticate this plugin with the PostFinanceCheckout API.

spaceId.label: Space ID
spaceId.tooltipText: The space ID is used to authenticate this plugin with the PostFinanceCheckout API.

userId.label: User ID
userId.tooltipText: The user ID is used to authenticate this plugin with the PostFinanceCheckout API.

settingForm.messageOrderDeliveryStateError: PostFinanceCheckout OrderDeliveryState could not be saved.
settingForm.messagePaymentMethodConfigurationError: PostFinanceCheckout PaymentMethodConfiguration could not be saved. Please check your credentials.
settingForm.messageWebHookError: PostFinanceCheckout WebHook could not be saved. Please check your credentials.

emailEnabled.label: Send order confirmation email
emailEnabled.tooltipText: If this setting is enabled your customers will receive an email from your store when their order payment is authorised

lineItemConsistencyEnabled.label: Line item consistency
lineItemConsistencyEnabled.tooltipText: If this option is enabled line item totals in PostFinanceCheckoutPayment will always match Shopware order total

invoiceDownloadEnabled.label: Invoice Download
invoiceDownloadEnabled.tooltipText: If this setting is enabled your customers will be able to download order invoices from PostFinanceCheckout
